name: Rosalind P. MOORE, as Parent Natural Guardian of John Doe, Minor; Rosalind P. Moore in her Own Right, Appellants, v. BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF CITY TRUSTS, Girard College Board of Managers, the Estate of Stephen Girard, the Administrators of the Estate of Stephen Girard, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Moore v. Board of Directors of City Trusts

judges: Before ZAPPALA, C.J., and CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
Chief Justice ZAPPALA did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: Rosalind P. MOORE, as Parent Natural Guardian of John Doe, Minor; Rosalind P. Moore in her Own Right, Appellants, v. BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF CITY TRUSTS, Girard College Board of Managers, the Estate of Stephen Girard, the Administrators of the Estate of Stephen Girard, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Chief Justice ZAPPALA did not participate in the decision of this case.
Justice NIGRO dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Rhonda Hill Wilson, for appellant, Rosalind P. Moore.
Howard A. Rosenthal, for appellees, Bd. of Directors of City Trust, et al.
casebody.head_matter:
795 A.2d 968
Rosalind P. MOORE, as Parent Natural Guardian of John Doe, Minor; Rosalind P. Moore in her Own Right, Appellants, v. BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF CITY TRUSTS, Girard College Board of Managers, the Estate of Stephen Girard, the Administrators of the Estate of Stephen Girard, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 8, 2002.
Deeided April 26, 2002.
Rhonda Hill Wilson, for appellant, Rosalind P. Moore.
Howard A. Rosenthal, for appellees, Bd. of Directors of City Trust, et al.
Before ZAPPALA, C.J., and CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR and EAKIN, JJ.
